title: Zimbabwe to cut power to mines, others over $77 mln in unpaid bills
text:
Zimbabwe to cut power to mines, others over $77 mln in unpaid bills

Commodities 17 minutes ago (Oct 26, 2019 10:30)

Zimbabwe to cut power to mines, others over $77 mln in unpaid bills HARARE, Oct 24 (Reuters) - Zimbabwe's state-owned electricity distributor, grappling with drought and ageing equipment, said on Thursday it will disconnect mines, farms and other users as it looks to recover $77 million in unpaid bills. The southern African nation is experiencing daily power cuts lasting up to 18 hours after a severe drought reduced water levels at the country's biggest hydro plant.

Zimbabwe to cut power to mines, others over $77 mln in unpaid bills
description: Zimbabwe to cut power to mines, others over $77 mln in unpaid bills
